content_blocks.text: Customer testimonials:

I really enjoyed it! The content was highly applicable and really fulfilled the promise of the course. We had teachers who deal with the day-to-day and implement these initiatives in large institutions. So all the topics, even when theoreticalwere covered in a very practical way. Student of the Data Science for Decision Makers Course

I think the lessons were very clear and generated many insights into how we can use AI to improve our work. Congratulations on the initiative. A fundamental course for understanding how AI could be applied in the bank. AI for Business student
